details.title: Corrections to “Tunable Metamaterials for Controlling THz Radiation” [Sep 12 538-555]
details.abstract: In the above-named article [ibid., vol. 2, no. 5, pp. 538-555, Sep. 2012], the authors would like to correct the following print error in the legend to Fig. 14, which should be read as follows: "Fig. 14. Broad-band active metamaterial in the THz region [69]. (a) Schematics for resonator patterns on a VO2 thin film and a SEM image. (b) SEM image. (c) Transmission of the broad-band resonator for 305 K (blue) and 375 K (red). (Reprinted with permission from American Chemical Society.)" Also, the name of the author, written as Jinyun Kihm in the byline of the original article, should instead have been: Jineun Kim.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Terahertz Science and Technology
details.sponsor: IEEE Microwave Theory and Techniques Society
